script:
# configure web server sed -i "s|^DocumentRoot.*|DocumentRoot \"%{drupal-web-dir}\"|" /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf
# load drupal configuration in apache if pidof httpd >/dev/null; then info=`systemctl reload httpd 2>&1` || (status=$?; echo $info; exit $status) else info=`systemctl start httpd 2>&1` || (status=$?; echo $info; exit $status) fi
# create drupal site if one does not exist cd %{drupal-web-dir}
# test drush core-status in a separate step so that that the script exits # with an error if the command fails info=`drush core-status 2>&1` || (status=$?; echo $info; exit $status)
# create new site if ! drush core-status | grep -q "%{drupal-db-name}"; then %{drupal-site-install-script} systemctl reload httpd fi
# ensure correct permissions on sites/default/files dir chown -R apache:apache %{drupal-web-dir}/sites/default/files chcon -R -t httpd_sys_content_rw_t %{drupal-web-dir}/sites/default/files
